DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : 1-year multidomain health promotion prevention physical cognitive decline community-living old people . Design : Methods : Randomized control trial Setting : Five city ( Taipei , Taichung , Kaohsiung , Kinmen , I-Lan ) Taiwan Participants : age 65 old community-dwelling prefrail frail adult Intervention : 1-year multidomain health promotion ( physical , cognitive , nutritional intervention ) Measurements : Primary outcome include frailty status cognitive performance . Secondary outcome include depressive symptom , nutrition assessment , functional capacity ; All variable measure 0 , 6 , 12 month . The effect intervention investigate intention-to-treat analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Taiwan Health Promotion Intervention Study Elders
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criterion include : community-dwelling old people age 65 old , confirm diagnosis dementia dependent activity daily live exclude . Primary outcome include frailty status measure CHS frailty score . general sub-domain cognitive performance measure Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) . Secondary outcome include depressive symptom , nutrition assessment , functional capacity ; evaluate 5-item Geriatric Depression scale ( GDS-5 ) , Mini-nutrition Assessment ( MNA ) , instrumental activity daily live ( IADL ) individually .
DOC.criteria: Prefrail frail communitydwelling people Institutionalized ADL dependent Diagnosed dementia Limited life expectancy
